title: New model IDs primate species with potential to spread Zika in the Americas

title_detail.value: New model IDs primate species with potential to spread Zika in the Americas

summary: In the Americas, primate species likely to harbor Zika -- and potentially transmit the virus -- are common, abundant, and often live near people. So reports a new study.

summary_detail.value: In the Americas, primate species likely to harbor Zika -- and potentially transmit the virus -- are common, abundant, and often live near people. So reports a new study.
